subject: Photography
title: Mindfulness and Photography
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Mindfulness and Photography.

hook.text: Photography is meditation with a viewfinder. It forces you into the present moment with total focus.

buildup.text: Mindful photography is the practice of using the camera as a tool for present-moment awareness and attention.

discovery.text: When you photograph mindfully, you notice breath, light, sound, and small details you'd normally rush past.

twist.text: The goal isn't better photos. It's a better experience of seeing. The images are souvenirs of attention.

climax.text: Mindful photography reduces anxiety and increases appreciation for ordinary moments. It's therapy with a lens.

punchline.text: Pick up a camera. Slow down. Breathe. See.

quiz.question: What is the primary goal of mindful photography?
options: Deepening present-moment awareness rather than producing perfect images
